bibl.title: NHC II, 2 and the Oxyrhynchus Fragments (P. Oxy. 1, 654, 655): Overlooked Evidence for a Syriac Gospel of Thomas. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Whereas it is generally assumed that the Gospel of Thomas was first composed in Greek, the evidence confirms that the Nag Hammadi text was first set down in Syriac. - P. Oxy. I, 1; IV, 654-655 (= van Haelst 593-595).
